channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AILOS Robotics introduces drive technology to make robots lighter, more agile, and safer
item.description: VUB spinoff AILOS Robotics said its patented gearbox heralds a new era for humanoids, cobots, and wearable robotics. The post AILOS Robotics introduce...

item.title: iRobot debt acquired by contract manufacturer as bankruptcy looms
